kit.leader_skill: "Planet Namek Saga" Category Ki +3 and HP, ATK & DEF +150%

super_attack.name: Psycho Eraser (Extreme)
super_attack.effect: Greatly raises ATK & DEF for 1 turn; Causes supreme damage to enemy; Greatly lowers ATK & DEF

passive_skill.name: Unprecedented Secret Weapons
passive_skill.effect: (Forever) ATK & DEF 200% up; (Forever) Damage reduction rate 30% up; (Forever) Great chance of guarding all attacks; (Forever) Seals the attacked enemy's Super Attack; After guard is activated: DEF 100% up; Launches an additional attack that has a high chance of becoming a Super Attack; When attacking with 12 or more Ki: ATK & DEF 50% up; For every attack received: (Forever) ATK & DEF 20% up (up to 100%); When there is an ally whose name includes "Ginyu" attacking in the same turn: Guards all attacks; Damage reduction rate 30% up before attacking; Stuns the attacked enemy

lines.context: After guard is activated
